article.title: Methodological Framework for Determining the Land Eligibility of Renewable Energy Sources

multiple_choice_question.text: What does the Region Mask (RM) represent?
choices: The area covered by a specific RES technology
The geographic area to be investigated for LE analysis
The distribution of exclusion constraints within a region
The total installable capacity of a region

multiple_choice_question.text: What is the purpose of the 'Buffer distance (For rasters)' step in the exclusion flow chart?
choices: To extend the region mask to encompass a larger area
To apply a buffer distance around the indicated exclusion pixels
To determine the distance from a specific feature to each pixel
To convert vector data into a raster format

multiple_choice_question.text: What does a pixel value of '0' in the 'Railways Prior' dataset represent?
choices: Locations exactly on the railway's path
Locations within 100 meters of the railway
Locations not covered by the Prior dataset
Locations excluded by all other constraints

multiple_choice_question.text: Which of the following criteria is NOT classified as a Conservation criterion in Table 1?
